title: New client doubles in resource use overtime
body: Plus the game map uses way more resouces than it used to use. I couldn't even get back into my game for 10 minutes because it caused my PC to come to a halt. I lost my promos because of this and back in the 20 wait time. Fix your client and game, pls.

replies.body: it is using over 1.5 gigs of ram compared to 1gig it used to use. My specs were fine using adobe air. Fix your buggy client. It eats more resources than Firefox

The updated client should have no impact on an actual match, so any issues in-game may be happening from something else.  What exactly is happening and what do you mean when you say halt?  Are there any error messages?  I also recommend double checking our[ minimum and recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide to make sure your PC can play league.  Let me know!
